name: Notion Chron OS
description: A productivity system designed to help you keep track of your daily, weekly, and monthly goals.What's included?Tasks: see your daily, weekly, and monthly tasks in one placeProgress dashboard: to help you monitor the progress of tasksCategory dashboard: to help you group related tasks togetherPriority dashboard: to help you see the most important tasks firstBoilerplate template: readily create new tasks using OKR frameworkPreview:
features: Tasks: see your daily, weekly, and monthly tasks in one place; Progress dashboard: to help you monitor the progress of tasks; Category dashboard: to help you group related tasks together; Priority dashboard: to help you see the most important tasks first; Boilerplate template: readily create new tasks using OKR framework
